alert.note: Alert for Henry; Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:01PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Henry and southeastern Patrick Counties and the City of Martinsville through 730 PM EDT... At 701 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fieldale, or near Spencer, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martinsville... Spencer... Axton... Bassett... Leatherwood... Critz... and Villa Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
